item.title: 001. Dublin
item.description:
Dublin, Ireland #

  • City: éƒ½æŸæ— (dou1 paak3 lam4)

Dublin is the capital city of Ireland, located on the country’s east coast where the River Liffey flows into the sea. ğŸŒŠ It’s the largest city in Ireland and has been the country’s most important city for hundreds of years! ğŸ™ï¸

Where Is Dublin? ğŸ“ #

Dublin sits near the middle of Ireland’s eastern coastline. It’s like the heart of Ireland, with many important roads and railways connecting it to other parts of the country. ğŸš‚ The beautiful River Liffey runs right through the middle of the city before emptying into the Irish Sea. ğŸŒŠ

Prague is the capital and largest city of the Czech Republic, a country located right in the middle of Europe. People often call Prague the “Heart of Europe” â¤ï¸ because it sits almost in the center of the continent! The city is built along the beautiful Vltava river ğŸŒŠ and is famous for its colorful buildings ğŸŒˆ and historic bridges ğŸŒ‰.

item.title: 003. Stockholm
item.description:
Stockholm, Sweden #

  • City: æ–¯å¾·å“¥çˆ¾æ‘© (si1 dak1 go1 ji5 mo1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª ç‘å…¸ (seoi6 din2)

Stockholm is a beautiful city that sits on a collection of islands in Sweden. It’s the capital and largest city of Sweden, located in Northern Europe. Stockholm is a special place with lots of fascinating history, delicious food, and exciting things to see and do! ğŸŒŸ

Where in the World is Stockholm? ğŸŒ #

Stockholm is located in Sweden, which is part of Scandinavia in Northern Europe. The city sits at a special spot where Lake MÃ¤laren meets the Baltic Sea. What makes Stockholm super cool is that it’s built across 14 different islands that are all connected by 57 bridges! ğŸŒ‰ The exact location of Stockholm is 59.334591Â° north and 18.063240Â° east on your globe or map. This unique island layout gives Stockholm the nickname “Beauty on Water.” ğŸ’§

item.title: 007. Florence
item.description:
florence, italy #

  • City: ä½›ç¾…å€«æ–¯ (fat6 lo4 leon4 si1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ ç¾©å¤§åˆ© (ji6 daai6 lei6)

Florence is a beautiful historic city located in north-central Italy, in a region called Tuscany. Let’s explore this amazing place that’s full of art, history, and delicious food! ğŸ¨ğŸ

Where is Florence? ğŸ“ #

Florence sits on the banks of the River Arno, surrounded by pretty hills. It’s about 160 feet above sea level and serves as the capital city of Tuscany. If you look at a map of Italy, you’ll find Florence about 65 miles south of Bologna and 190 miles southeast of Milan. The city has coordinates of 43.769562, 11.255814, which are like its special address on Earth! ğŸŒğŸ—ºï¸

Reykjavik is a fascinating city filled with colorful buildings ğŸ ğŸŒˆ, interesting people ğŸ‘¥, and stunning natural surroundings ğŸŒ¿ğŸï¸. As Iceland’s capital and largest city, it has so much to offer for curious young explorers! ğŸ§­ğŸ‘§ğŸ§’

Where in the World is Reykjavik? ğŸŒ #

Reykjavik is located in the southwestern part of Iceland, sitting on the shores of FaxaflÃ³i bay ğŸŒŠ. Did you know it’s the northernmost capital city in the world? ğŸ§­â„ï¸ That means it’s farther north than any other country’s main city ğŸ—ºï¸. The city covers about 200 square kilometers of land, which is plenty of space for its residents ğŸ¡.

Copenhagen is the vibrant capital city of Denmark. This colorful city sits on the eastern shore of an island called Zealand. If you look at a map, you’ll find Copenhagen facing the Ã˜resund Strait, which is the body of water that separates Denmark from its neighbor, Sweden. The Swedish city of MalmÃ¶ is just on the other side, and the two cities are connected by a huge bridge ğŸŒ‰.

item.title: 012. Vienna

Vienna, Austria #

Vienna is the capital city of Austria, a country in Europe known for its beautiful landscapes ğŸŒ„ and rich history ğŸ“œ. It is located in the northeastern part of Austria and lies near the Danube River ğŸŒŠ, one of Europeâ€™s longest rivers. The city is surrounded by lush green hills ğŸŒ¿ and even has vineyards ğŸ‡ within its borders, making it unique among world capitals.

item.title: 014. London
item.description:
London, UK #

  • City: å€«æ•¦ (leon4 deon1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ è‹±åœ‹ (jing1 gwok3)

London is the exciting capital city of England and the United Kingdom. Sitting in the southeast of England on the River Thames ğŸŒŠ (pronounced “Temz”), this bustling city is packed with history, culture, and fascinating sights that would make any young explorer’s eyes ğŸ‘€ widen with wonder!

Where is London? ğŸ“ #

London is located in the southeast part of England on the River Thames. The river flows right through the middle of the city ğŸŒ‡, dividing it into north and south parts. Long ago, people chose this spot to build London because it was the lowest point where they could build a bridge across the Thames. The city has grown over thousands of years from a small Roman settlement to one of the world’s most important cities today!

item.title: 016. Riga
item.description:
Riga, Latvia #

  • City: é‡ŒåŠ  (lei5 gaa1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡» æ‹‰è„«ç¶­äº (laai1 tyut3 wai4 aa3)

Riga is the capital city of Latvia, a beautiful country in Northern Europe. It’s a place filled with history, amazing buildings, and friendly people. Let’s explore this fascinating city together! ğŸ°

Where in the World is Riga? ğŸŒ #

Riga sits on both banks of the Daugava River, just 9 miles (15 km) from where the river meets the Gulf of Riga and the Baltic Sea. ğŸŒŠ If you look at a map of Europe, you’ll find Latvia nestled between Estonia and Lithuania, with Riga located near Latvia’s coast. The city is so important that about one-third of the entire country’s population lives there! ğŸ‘¥

Barcelona is a beautiful coastal city located in the northeastern part of Spain. It is the capital of the region called Catalonia, nestled between the sparkling blue Mediterranean Sea ğŸŒŠ and beautiful mountains â›°ï¸. Before we explore more about this amazing city, let me share that Barcelona is Spain’s second most populous city and is filled with colorful buildings ğŸŒˆ, delicious food ğŸ½ï¸, and friendly people ğŸ˜Š!

item.title: 020. Lisbon
item.description:
Lisbon, Portugal #

  • City: é‡Œæ–¯æœ¬ (lei5 si1 bun2)
  • Country: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡¹ è‘¡è„ç‰™ (pou4 tou4 ngaa4)

Lisbon is a fascinating city with so much to discover! ğŸ“š It’s the capital and largest city of Portugal, and it’s filled with colorful buildings, delicious food, and lots of history. ğŸŒˆğŸ¤ğŸ° Let’s explore this amazing place together! ğŸŒŸ

Where is Lisbon? ğŸ“ #

Lisbon is located in western Portugal, sitting on the northern shore of the Tagus River where it meets the Atlantic Ocean. ğŸŒ It’s actually the westernmost capital city on the European mainland - that means if you traveled directly west from Lisbon across the ocean, the next land you’d hit would be America! ğŸŒŠ The city is built on seven steep hills, which gives it beautiful views but can make walking around quite a workout! ğŸ—ºï¸â›°ï¸

item.title: 024. Athens
item.description:
Athens, Greece #

  • City: é›…å…¸ (ngaa5 din2)
  • Country: ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡· å¸Œè‡˜ (hei1 laap6)

Before diving into the details, Athens is an incredible ancient city that has given the world democracy, beautiful architecture like the Parthenon, and continues to be a vibrant capital city with millions of people. It’s a place where you can walk through history while enjoying modern city life! ğŸŒ†

Where is Athens Located? ğŸ“ #

Athens is the capital city of Greece. It’s located in a region called Attica, which is a peninsula in the eastern part of Central Greece. A peninsula is a piece of land surrounded by water on three sides. Athens sits on this Attica peninsula, which sticks out into the Aegean Sea. ğŸŒŠ

Rome is one of the most famous and historic cities in the world! ğŸŒ Located in central Italy, this amazing city has thousands of years of history and fascinating things to discover. Let’s explore the wonderful city of Rome together! ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹

Where in the World is Rome? ğŸŒ #

Rome is located in the central part of Italy, in a region called Lazio. ğŸ—ºï¸ If you look at a map, you’ll find Rome at these coordinates: 41.9028Â° North, 12.4964Â° East. The city sits on the banks of the Tiber River, which flows right through the middle of Rome. ğŸŒŠ

item.title: 026. Warsaw
item.description:
Warsaw, Poland #

  • City: è¯æ²™ (waa4 saa1)
  • Country: ğŸ‡µğŸ‡± æ³¢è˜­ (bo1 laan4)

Warsaw is the capital and largest city of Poland. It’s an exciting place with lots of history ğŸ“š, delicious food ğŸ², and amazing people who have changed the world! Let’s discover what makes this city so special.

Where is Warsaw? ğŸ“ #

Warsaw sits right in the middle of Poland on both sides of the Vistula River ğŸŒŠ, which is the largest river in the country. It’s located in east-central Poland, about 350 kilometers (225 miles) from the Baltic Sea ğŸŒŠ. The city is built on what geographers call the North European plains. If you look at a map of Europe ğŸŒ, you’ll find Warsaw almost in the heart of the continent!
